content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment in Mannheim quite suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider an appropriate amount?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a fair price, considering the size of the apartment and the location. Could we start at 650 Euros per month?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, 650 Euros per month is a reasonable starting point. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to pay a bit more to secure the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I would be willing to pay a bit more. How about 675 Euros per month? I believe this would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, your offer of 675 Euros per month is quite close to my asking price. Would you be willing to go just a bit higher to finalize the agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
